Description: uplink with full message received from LT-501 device with protocol 12 and command ID 4098
INPUT
{
  message: {
  protocolVersion: 12,
  protocolVersionTxt: '0C',
  commandId: 4098,
  commandIdTxt: 'Tracking report',
  longitude: 121.488603,
  longitudeTxt: '121.488603',
  latitude: 24.998755,
  latitudeTxt: '24.998755',
  gpsFixStatus: 1,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: '2D fix',
  reportType: 2,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Periodic mode report',
  batteryCapacity: 100,
  timestamp: 'Fri, 18 Aug 2017 07:35:00 GMT',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 100 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', records: [{"value":{"longitude":121.488603,"latitude":24.998755},"eventTime":"2017-08-18T07:35:00.000Z"}] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message received from LT-501 device with protocol 128 and command ID 131
INPUT
{
  message: {
  protocolVersion: 128,
  protocolVersionTxt: '80',
  commandId: 131,
  commandIdTxt: 'Short tracking report',
  longitude: 121.48775699999999,
  longitudeTxt: '121.48775699999999',
  latitude: 24.996353,
  latitudeTxt: '24.996353',
  gpsFixStatus: 2,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: '3D fix',
  reportType: 4,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Motion mode static report',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [{"longitude":121.48775699999999,"latitude":24.996353}] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message received from LT-501 device with protocol 12 and command ID 2816
INPUT
{
  message: {
  protocolVersion: 12,
  protocolVersionTxt: '0C',
  commandId: 2816,
  commandIdTxt: 'Help report',
  longitude: 121.48796,
  longitudeTxt: '121.48796',
  latitude: 24.996516999999997,
  latitudeTxt: '24.996516999999997',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  alarmType: 1,
  alarmTypeTxt: 'Help report',
  batteryCapacity: 100,
  timestamp: 'Fri, 18 Aug 2017 07:42:28 GMT',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 100 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', records: [{"value":{"longitude":121.48796,"latitude":24.996516999999997},"eventTime":"2017-08-18T07:42:28.000Z"}] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message received from LT-501 device with protocol 128 and command ID 1
INPUT
{
  message: {
  protocolVersion: 128,
  protocolVersionTxt: '80',
  commandId: 1,
  commandIdTxt: 'Short help report',
  longitude: 121.487493,
  longitudeTxt: '121.487493',
  latitude: 24.996492999999997,
  latitudeTxt: '24.996492999999997',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  alarmType: 1,
  alarmTypeTxt: 'Help report',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [{"longitude":121.487493,"latitude":24.996492999999997}] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message received from LT-501 device with protocol 12 and command ID 4866 where the fix status, report, alarm, uuid should returned - 1
INPUT
{
  message: {
  protocolVersion: 12,
  protocolVersionTxt: '0C',
  commandId: 4866,
  commandIdTxt: 'Beacon tracking report',
  uuid: '00000000359905af0e720c8f204544b6da8b2774',
  beaconType: 1,
  beaconTypeTxt: 'iBeacon',
  reportType: 2,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Periodic mode report',
  rssi: 0,
  txPower: 197,
  batteryCapacity: 100
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  rssi: { unitId: 'dBm', record: 0 },
  intensity: { unitId: 'dB', record: 197, nature: 'TxPower' },
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 100 }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message received from LT-501 device with protocol 12 and command ID 4866 where the fix status, report, alarm, uuid should returned - 2
INPUT
{
  message: {
  protocolVersion: 12,
  protocolVersionTxt: '0C',
  commandId: 1792,
  commandIdTxt: 'Beacon help report',
  uuid: '00000000359905af0e720c8f204544b6da8b2774',
  beaconType: 1,
  beaconTypeTxt: 'iBeacon',
  alarmType: 1,
  alarmTypeTxt: 'Help report',
  rssi: 188,
  txPower: 197,
  batteryCapacity: 100
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  rssi: { unitId: 'dBm', record: 188 },
  intensity: { unitId: 'dB', record: 197, nature: 'TxPower' },
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 100 }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message received from LT-501 device with protocol 128 and command ID 1, whne one of GPS coordinates are not applicable
INPUT
{
  message: {
  protocolVersion: 128,
  protocolVersionTxt: '80',
  commandId: 1,
  commandIdTxt: 'Short help report',
  longitude: -858.993531,
  longitudeTxt: 'N/A',
  latitude: 24.996555999999998,
  latitudeTxt: '24.996555999999998',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  alarmType: 1,
  alarmTypeTxt: 'Help report',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink when the length of payload is wrong then decoder not available
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: false,
  gpsAvailable: false
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  
}
